titleStmt.title: Vox populi suprema Rex Carolus. Or, The voice of the people for King Charles. With a true accompt of the actions of the Kingdoms grand trappanners, since the year 1641 to this present year 1660.

notesStmt.note: Verse: "Go, go Bellona, try if thou can'st ..."
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
